name: topnlly

body.origin:
|- wceq(cnlly(ctop), ctop)
-| wceq(clly(ctop), ctop)
-| wb(wceq(clly(ctop), ctop), wceq(cnlly(ctop), ctop))
body.pretty:
⊢ N-Locally(Top)= Top
⊣ Locally(Top)= Top
⊣ (Locally(Top)= Top ↔ N-Locally(Top)= Top)

-| wb(wceq(clly(ctop), ctop), wceq(cnlly(ctop), ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ N-Locally(Top)= Top

comment: A topology is n-locally a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
